heading: century's champs
subheading: because it was the last world series of the century -- and because the new york yankees already had 24 championships under their belts heading into this one -- it was altogether fitting that the bronx bombers swept the atlanta braves aside in four straight to claim their 25th title. it puts an indelible stamp on what was undeniably a yankee century. even red sox fans will have to concede that, though the best of them never will.
author: wired staff
text: because it was the last world series of the century -- and because the new york yankees already had 24 championships under their belts heading into this one -- it was altogether fitting that the bronx bombers swept the atlanta braves aside in four straight to claim their 25th title. it puts an indelible stamp on what was undeniably a yankee century. even red sox fans will have to concede that, though the best of them never will.
